languages.text: В дни, когда Идира Тласс готовилась принять свой рок, она нашла наставление там, где не ждала — в мудрости Кровавой паутины. Слова Висиря Кибеллы, познавшей смерть как никто прочий, помогли псайкеру взглянуть в уготованное будущее с сожалением, но без ужаса. В кубрике офицерской палубы долгие годы пустовал стол, на поверхности которого вырезан замысловатый лабиринт. Никто не садился за него в знак почтения к тихим и искренним беседам между псайкером и служительницей Неумирающего, что велись за ним когда-то.

At a time when Idira Tlass was preparing to accept her fate, she found guidance where she least expected it — in the wisdom of the Bloodspun Web. The words of Vizsier Kibellah, who had come to know death better than any mortal soul, helped Idira look to her future not without regret, but without fear. For many years afterward, there was an empty table in the common area of the officers' deck that had an intricate labyrinth carved into the tabletop. None of the crew sat at that table out of respect for the quiet and candid conversations once shared at it by a psyker and a servant of the Undying Emperor.

Слова Висиря Кибеллы, познавшей смерть как никто прочий, помогли псайкеру взглянуть в уготованное будущее с сожалением, но без ужаса. languages.text: Cuando Idira Tlass ya estaba dispuesta a aceptar su destino, halló su camino donde menos lo esperaba: en la sabiduría de la Red Sanguinolenta. Las palabras de la visir Kibellah, cuya familiaridad con la muerte sobrepasaba la del común de los mortales, ayudaron a Idira a contemplar su futuro con remordimientos pero sin temor. Durante muchos años hubo en la zona común de la cubierta de oficiales una mesa vacía en cuya superficie se había grabado un intrincado laberinto. Ningún miembro de la tripulación se sentaba a aquella mesa por respeto a las discretas y sinceras conversaciones que una vez mantuvieron en ella una psíquica y una sierva del Emperador Inmortal.
languages.original_text: At a time when Idira Tlass was preparing to accept her fate, she found guidance where she least expected it — in the wisdom of the Bloodspun Web. The words of Vizsier Kibellah, who had come to know death better than any mortal soul, helped Idira look to her future not without regret, but without fear. For many years afterward, there was an empty table in the common area of the officers' deck that had an intricate labyrinth carved into the tabletop. None of the crew sat at that table out of respect for the quiet and candid conversations once shared at it by a psyker and a servant of the Undying Emperor.

traits.locale_text: Cuando Idira Tlass ya estaba dispuesta a aceptar su destino, halló su camino donde menos lo esperaba: en la sabiduría de la Red Sanguinolenta. Las palabras de la visir Kibellah, cuya familiaridad con la muerte sobrepasaba la del común de los mortales, ayudaron a Idira a contemplar su futuro con remordimientos pero sin temor. Durante muchos años hubo en la zona común de la cubierta de oficiales una mesa vacía en cuya superficie se había grabado un intrincado laberinto. Ningún miembro de la tripulación se sentaba a aquella mesa por respeto a las discretas y sinceras conversaciones que una vez mantuvieron en ella una psíquica y una sierva del Emperador Inmortal.

languages.text: イディラ・タラースが自分の運命を受け入れようとしていたとき、彼女は思いがけないところで導きを見つけた…ブラッドスパン・ウェブの知恵の中で。死を誰よりもよく知るようになったヴィジール・キベラの言葉は、イディラが後悔することなく、しかし恐れることなく自分の未来を見つめる助けとなった。その後何年もの間、士官用デッキの共有スペースには、天板に複雑な迷宮が刻まれた空のテーブルがあった。かつて異能者と不死の皇帝のしもべがそのテーブルで交わした静かで率直な会話に敬意を表し、乗組員は誰もそのテーブルには座らなかった。
languages.original_text: At a time when Idira Tlass was preparing to accept her fate, she found guidance where she least expected it — in the wisdom of the Bloodspun Web. The words of Vizsier Kibellah, who had come to know death better than any mortal soul, helped Idira look to her future not without regret, but without fear. For many years afterward, there was an empty table in the common area of the officers' deck that had an intricate labyrinth carved into the tabletop. None of the crew sat at that table out of respect for the quiet and candid conversations once shared at it by a psyker and a servant of the Undying Emperor.

traits.locale_text: イディラ・タラースが自分の運命を受け入れようとしていたとき、彼女は思いがけないところで導きを見つけた…ブラッドスパン・ウェブの知恵の中で。死を誰よりもよく知るようになったヴィジール・キベラの言葉は、イディラが後悔することなく、しかし恐れることなく自分の未来を見つめる助けとなった。その後何年もの間、士官用デッキの共有スペースには、天板に複雑な迷宮が刻まれた空のテーブルがあった。かつて異能者と不死の皇帝のしもべがそのテーブルで交わした静かで率直な会話に敬意を表し、乗組員は誰もそのテーブルには座らなかった。

languages.text: 就在伊迪拉·特拉斯准备接受自己的命运时，她在最为意想不到的地方找到了希望——织血罗网的信条为她指明了前路。宿老绮贝菈比任何人都更加了解死亡，她的话语帮助伊迪拉以另一种方式展望自己的未来。尽管伊迪拉心中仍有遗憾，但她已经不再惧怕未来。许多年后，军官甲板的公共区域处摆着一张空空如也的桌子，桌面上刻着错综复杂的迷宫图案。没有任何船员会坐在桌旁，因为所有人都心怀敬意，铭记某位灵能者与某位不死神皇的忠仆曾在桌边进行过一场安静而敞开心扉的谈话。
languages.original_text: At a time when Idira Tlass was preparing to accept her fate, she found guidance where she least expected it — in the wisdom of the Bloodspun Web. The words of Vizsier Kibellah, who had come to know death better than any mortal soul, helped Idira look to her future not without regret, but without fear. For many years afterward, there was an empty table in the common area of the officers' deck that had an intricate labyrinth carved into the tabletop. None of the crew sat at that table out of respect for the quiet and candid conversations once shared at it by a psyker and a servant of the Undying Emperor.

traits.locale_text: 就在伊迪拉·特拉斯准备接受自己的命运时，她在最为意想不到的地方找到了希望——织血罗网的信条为她指明了前路。宿老绮贝菈比任何人都更加了解死亡，她的话语帮助伊迪拉以另一种方式展望自己的未来。尽管伊迪拉心中仍有遗憾，但她已经不再惧怕未来。许多年后，军官甲板的公共区域处摆着一张空空如也的桌子，桌面上刻着错综复杂的迷宫图案。没有任何船员会坐在桌旁，因为所有人都心怀敬意，铭记某位灵能者与某位不死神皇的忠仆曾在桌边进行过一场安静而敞开心扉的谈话。

languages.text: Gerade als Idira Tlass bereit war, ihr Schicksal zu akzeptieren, fand sie Führung, wo sie sie am wenigsten erwartet hätte ... in der Weisheit des Blutgesponnenen Netzes. Die Worte von Wesir Kibellah, die den Tod besser kannte, als jede sterbliche Seele, halfen Idira, nicht ohne Reue, aber ohne Angst in die Zukunft zu blicken. Noch viele Jahre später stand im Aufenthaltsraum des Offiziersdecks ein leerer Tisch, auf dessen Platte ein kompliziertes Labyrinth geritzt war. Kein Mitglied der Crew setzte sich aus Respekt vor den offenen Gesprächen, die ein Psioniker und ein Diener des Todlosen Imperators einst an ihm führten, an diesen Tisch.
languages.original_text: At a time when Idira Tlass was preparing to accept her fate, she found guidance where she least expected it — in the wisdom of the Bloodspun Web. The words of Vizsier Kibellah, who had come to know death better than any mortal soul, helped Idira look to her future not without regret, but without fear. For many years afterward, there was an empty table in the common area of the officers' deck that had an intricate labyrinth carved into the tabletop. None of the crew sat at that table out of respect for the quiet and candid conversations once shared at it by a psyker and a servant of the Undying Emperor.

traits.locale_text: Gerade als Idira Tlass bereit war, ihr Schicksal zu akzeptieren, fand sie Führung, wo sie sie am wenigsten erwartet hätte ... in der Weisheit des Blutgesponnenen Netzes. Die Worte von Wesir Kibellah, die den Tod besser kannte, als jede sterbliche Seele, halfen Idira, nicht ohne Reue, aber ohne Angst in die Zukunft zu blicken. Noch viele Jahre später stand im Aufenthaltsraum des Offiziersdecks ein leerer Tisch, auf dessen Platte ein kompliziertes Labyrinth geritzt war. Kein Mitglied der Crew setzte sich aus Respekt vor den offenen Gesprächen, die ein Psioniker und ein Diener des Todlosen Imperators einst an ihm führten, an diesen Tisch.

languages.text: À l'heure où Idira Tlass se préparait à accepter son destin, elle trouva un guide là où elle s'y attendait le moins... dans la sagesse de la Toile de Sang. Les propos de la vizir Kibellah, qui en était venue à connaître la mort plus intimement que n'importe quelle âme mortelle, l'aidèrent à envisager son avenir non sans regret, mais sans peur. Pendant de nombreuses années par la suite, il y eut dans la salle commune du pont des officiers une table vide sur laquelle était gravé un labyrinthe complexe. Aucun membre de l'équipage ne s'y attablait jamais, et ce, par respect pour les longues conversations à cœur ouvert entre une psyker et une servante de l'Empereur Immortel dont elle avait été témoin par le passé.
languages.original_text: At a time when Idira Tlass was preparing to accept her fate, she found guidance where she least expected it — in the wisdom of the Bloodspun Web. The words of Vizsier Kibellah, who had come to know death better than any mortal soul, helped Idira look to her future not without regret, but without fear. For many years afterward, there was an empty table in the common area of the officers' deck that had an intricate labyrinth carved into the tabletop. None of the crew sat at that table out of respect for the quiet and candid conversations once shared at it by a psyker and a servant of the Undying Emperor.

traits.locale_text: À l'heure où Idira Tlass se préparait à accepter son destin, elle trouva un guide là où elle s'y attendait le moins... dans la sagesse de la Toile de Sang. Les propos de la vizir Kibellah, qui en était venue à connaître la mort plus intimement que n'importe quelle âme mortelle, l'aidèrent à envisager son avenir non sans regret, mais sans peur. Pendant de nombreuses années par la suite, il y eut dans la salle commune du pont des officiers une table vide sur laquelle était gravé un labyrinthe complexe. Aucun membre de l'équipage ne s'y attablait jamais, et ce, par respect pour les longues conversations à cœur ouvert entre une psyker et une servante de l'Empereur Immortel dont elle avait été témoin par le passé.

languages.text: İdira Tlass, kaderini kabul etmeye hazırlandığı esnada hiç beklemediği bir yerden kendine kılavuz edindi. Kanipi Ağı'nın bilgeliğini benimsedi. Ölümü tüm fânilerden daha iyi tanıyan Vezir Kibellah'nın sözleri, İdira'nın geleceğine pişmanlıktan arınarak olmasa bile korkudan arınarak bakmasında yardımcı oldu. Ardından geçen uzun yıllar boyunca subay güvertesi ortak alanında hep boş bir masa bulundu. Masanın üzerine detaylı bir labirent kazınmıştı. Mürettebattan hiç kimse, hürmetlerinden dolayı masaya oturmadı. Zira bir vakitler o masada bir ruhsezer ile Ölmeyen İmparator'un bir hizmetkârı arasında sessiz ve samimi sohbetler edilmişti.
languages.original_text: At a time when Idira Tlass was preparing to accept her fate, she found guidance where she least expected it — in the wisdom of the Bloodspun Web. The words of Vizsier Kibellah, who had come to know death better than any mortal soul, helped Idira look to her future not without regret, but without fear. For many years afterward, there was an empty table in the common area of the officers' deck that had an intricate labyrinth carved into the tabletop. None of the crew sat at that table out of respect for the quiet and candid conversations once shared at it by a psyker and a servant of the Undying Emperor.
